row.text: Petentibus Garcia magistro et fratribus Calatravensibus, Calatravam tuen- dam suscipit, fratrumque leges, bona, privilegia confirmat. Diffiniciones de Calatrava p. 37, Samper Montesa illustr. I. 145, Mascarefias Apolog. hist. p. 45, Manrique Ann. Cist. II. 400, Migne 200 p. 310. — „Iustis petentium desideriis“.
